text: John Godfrey Morris (December 7, 1916 â€“ July 28, 2017) was an American picture editor and an important figure in the history of photojournalism. He was born in Maple Shade, New Jersey. He worked for the weekly picture magazine Life throughout World War II. Morris died on July 28, 2017 in Paris of heart failure at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * Booknotes interview with Morris on Get the Picture, January 10, 1999. title: John G. Morris
